name: Microsoft Word Glossary File
summary: Learn about .GLY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The files 50convrt.gly, 55convrt.gly, and 60convrt.gly are provided with the MS Office for Windows 95 Resource Kit. They help convert Word 5.0, 5.5, and 6.0 for MS-DOS glossary entries into AutoText entries in Word 7.0.
The default glossary file is named normal.gly.

description: Glossary file used by Microsoft Word, a word processing program; includes data that helps convert glossary terms between versions of Word.
